title: only one alert message is shown when moving files/folders where they already exist
body:
### expected behaviour
when you move within the server using drag&drop one or more files or folder to a folder where they already exist, it shows different alert message for the different files or folder which already exist

### actual behaviour

when you move within the server using drag&drop one or more files or folder to a folder where they already exist, it shows only one alert message for one of the files or folders

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version 
2. move using drag&drop files or folders to another folder where these files or folders already exist
3. only one alert message is shown for one of the files or folders

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 enterprise rc1","edition":"enterprise"}
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ff,safari and chrome

operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
#### web server error log
```
debug	core	include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	20 de junio de 2013 17:49
debug	core	adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.	20 de junio de 2013 17:49
```
